item.title: How to Move the Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Move the Microsoft Windows Clock: With Mouse With Menu With Right Click No time to scroll down? Click through these tutorial slides: Follow along with a video tutorial: How to Move the Microsoft Windows Clock With Mouse Step 1: First open Windows Clock. Click, hold, and drag the top of the window to move it. Release the mouse to stop moving the window. How to Move the Microsoft Windows Clock With Menu Step 1: Open Windows Clock.
